title: Big money, quiet storm – the silent revolution in education publishing (Publishing Technology plc)
text: ( Source : Publishing Technology plc ) On the face of it, not much has changed in education publishing over the years. Major textbook publishers are still the world's most profitable publishers. The top five players still have an 85 percent
